package.name: MacOS Microsoft Outlook
package.releaseNotes:
Feature Updates: • Admin Pref: Added a preference for admins and or users to disable certificate alerts in Outlook for Mac. This is documented here. • Copilot – Meeting Recap: Quickly review Teams meeting recordings with meeting recap. View a meeting's recording, shared content, and more. • Copilot – Schedule Meeting from Email: Effortless scheduling with Copilot- transform email threads into productive meetings. • Message Recall: You can now recall your messages in Outlook for Mac. This feature allows users to retract messages you’ve sent, giving you greater control over your communications.
Resolved Issues: • Mail: Fixed an issue where On-Premise mailboxes could not be added in Legacy Outlook for Mac. • Mail: Fixed an issue where View Source option was not working for certain account types. • Mail: Fixed an issue where the option to change the default font for Reply or Forward emails was missing in Outlook settings.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft OneNote
package.releaseNotes:
This month’s update is bug fixes only.
Thanks for using OneNote! We listened to your feedback and updated the application with optimizations to help improve your note taking experience.
Having trouble? Send feedback in the app by clicking on the smiley face in the top-right of the app. Have an idea? Add to our feature suggestion box at https://aka.ms/onenotefeedback

package.name: MacOS Microsoft OneDrive
package.releaseNotes: Thank you for using OneDrive. We are always looking to update OneDrive to bring you the latest performance improvements and bug fixes for the best experience.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft Windows App
package.releaseNotes:
In this release we made the following updates:
• Hitting the ENTER key now initiates a connection to the device or app highlighted in the connection center. • Resolved an issue where holding SHIFT while using a mouse vertical scroll wheel did not correctly map to horizontal scrolls. • Only allow connections to Cloud PCs that are not processing device actions. • The Cloud PC notification sheet is now aware of user accounts. • Stored notifications associated with a user account are now removed when signing out the account. • Fixed translucency for notifications to pick up the correct background image. • Resolved an issue which prevented the client from reading the "dynamic resolution" RDP file property.
If you encounter any errors, you can contact us via Help > Submit Feedback.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft To-Do
package.releaseNotes: We fixed some bugs to improve the app experience.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft Azure VPN Client
package.releaseNotes: Added auto reconnect on VPN connections for intermittent/ server failures. Added notification which notifies user to install rosetta in case its not installed in arm machines. Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
